About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am an aspiring software engineer with a BA in Psychology & Studio Art from Hunter College.

I recently graduated from Fullstack Academy the coding bootcamp. I learned computer science fundamentals, front-end and back-end development, database management, common tools and best practices.

Previously completed The New York City Tech Talent Pipeline’s Bridge To Tech (B2T) Program. Prior to that completed 400+ hours of intensive coding--consisting of HTML, CSS, JS, & PYTHON--at Harlem Business Alliance’s Disrupt Harlem Code Squad Program where I also received mentorship from many industry mentors.

I am improving and working on building a website that caters to the needs of underserved communities by aggregating already existing programs and resources and organizing them in a clear, friendly and accessible way.

Proficient: JavaScript, Node, Express, Sequelize, React, Redux, Git, GitHub, HTML, CSS
Familiar: Python, SQL, React Native, Jasmine, Mocha, Chai, Java, Postico

Fullstack Academy

Software Engineering Immersive

Competitive software engineering program fully sponsored by the NYC Tech Talent Pipeline. Teaches computer science fundamentals, front-end and back-end development, database management, common tools and best practices.

The Knowledge House

Bridge To Tech

Completed 108 hours of instruction in HTML, CSS and JavaScript in preparation for advanced bootcamp and career opportunities.

Harlem Business Alliance

Dirsrupt Harlem Code Squad

Completed 600+ hours of intensive coding; consisting of HTML, CSS, JS. Created websites in order to help communities that are disenfranchised by offering them assistance and solutions.
